name: Mana Mana
description:
Mana Mana is a colectaton against the clock game, Mun is a mage who managed to barricate herself away from a monster, but this solution won't last forever. Collect all the mana potions to cast a spell powerfull enough to kill the monster before the time runs out!

Credits: 

Programmed by Kevin Grandez

Art by Gabriel Vasconelos (@gabe_illustrations)

Music by Beatriz Waves (Bento) and Miles Allen (@beat___riz)
